definition: TJET Trial ID
target or situation country
year the trial began; this is the first year that any prosecutorial activity began, usually starting with an indictment
year the trial ended; this is the year of the very last action regarding any trial proceedings, up to the last appeal decision for any accused
case description
case description (French translation)
When was/were the crime(s) committed? (years)
number of accused
number of accused records for trial
type of trial (domestic, international, hybrid, or foreign)
legal system of the proceedings
jurisdiction under which foreign trial was held
country of trial
COW numeric code of the target or situation country
COW numeric code of country where the trial was held
COW numeric code of country where the crime was committed
COW numeric code of country of the victim(s) of the crime
Was this trial focused on human rights or core international crimes?
Was this trial focused on intra-state conflict?
Is this a civil case?
Did this country start a democratic transition at some point before this trial?
Did this case fit the definition of post-autocratic transitional justice?
Did this country start an intra-state conflict at some point before this trial?
Did this case fit the definition of conflict transitional justice and can it be matched to a UCDP conflict ID?
UCDP Conflict ID
UCDP Dyad ID
Did this trial begin during or after intra-state conflict?
Was this trial first discovered in a State Department Human Rights Report?
prosecutor type
Did any reports question the fairness of the trial?
